climbs.name: The Teflon Don
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Tucker Tech, Cora, Blitzo, Graham, John

content.description:
Short and forgettable this offers a few good moves, but only a few. ClipÂ a bolt and make the crux reach/mantle onto a small ledge at the base of a right-facing corner. Climb the corner above getting gear where you can and continue to the top and anchors.

There really isn't any pro after the corner so falling exiting the corner is not a good idea.

With better routes nearby and the generally scrappy nature of the route it's hard to recommend this route. Half a star out of five.

Named for the infamous New York crime boss John Gotti (aka the Dapper Don).
content.protection:
1 bolt, tiny cams to 0.5 inch, bolted anchor/rap

The fixed pin in the corner is gone as of December 2019
content.location:
Located just right of

How Deep is Ben's Love

on the Teflon Boulder (aka: Boulder 7), a huge brown boulder that forms the eastern edge of the boulder field.
